items.sentence: Tom found it hard to hide the truth from Mary.
Tom didn't buy Mary anything for her birthday.
Tom dated Mary before he started dating Alice.
It'll take you an hour to walk to the station.
Tom came into the room with a gun in his hand.
Tom came over to my place yesterday for lunch.
The volcano has been inactive for a long time.
When was the last time that you bought a book?
Where do you want me to put these dirty socks?
I like to think I know what I'm talking about.
